BlackNightmare:

Blacknightmare couldn't sleep, her pain was starting and 
increasing.She touched glenty Malice's head while tears started to 
fall.

For her situation was worse, thinking to allt hings that would 
happen, made her feel despair; she didn't like loose Malice, but she 
knew that she couldn't betray him and lie him forever.

 

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice/ Hellplague:
>  
> Malice smiled a little.  He didn't fel like geting up, so he 
rested his head on the femme's shoulder, and slowly went to sleep.
>  
> Hellplague walked to her room.  She sighed as the doors opened and 
closed, and went over to her bed and fell on it, sighing again.  
Things had gotten so bad so quickly.  She shuddered at all the 
possiblities that lay at telling Malice.  She didn't want to, but...
> She didn't think about it more, as she too, fell asleep.
